title: Last of the windjammers
creator_credit: Athol Emerton and New England Film Productions
brief_description: A record of the departure from Newcastle of the barque Lawhill, one of the last of the square riggers to visit Australia. With a background of sea chanties, the scenes of the unfurling of the great sails of the stately vessel convey a vivid impression of the days of the windjammers.
